title: nIlOtpalAmbikAyA param
sahitya:
nIlOtpalAmbikAyA param nahi rE rE citta


anupallavi

 sAlOkAdi mukti dAyinyA surapati guruguha sannuta caraNAyA nIlaratana maNi bhUSiNyAh niranjanyA


caraNam   sthUla sUkSma kAraNa rUpiNyA bAlacandra sEvita vara dAyinyA kailAsa vilasita kuLakauLa mArga yOginyA
